messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: Scrapping unfair tuition fees, cutting taxes, creating jobs, fighting crime, cleaning up politics, fixing the economy

messages.title: Brown's record of shame
messages.content: Broke his promise not to raise taxes, signed the Lisbon Treaty without our say, sent our troops to war without proper equipment

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fair Taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: No one will pay taxes on the first Â£10,000 they earn.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fair Start for Every Child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting class sizes to ensure children get the start they deserve.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fair Future, Creating Jobs by making Britain Greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy, and energy efficiency homes to create jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fair Deal for You from Politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: An elected House of Lords, a fair voting system, the power of recall, and stop unfair MP expenses.

issues.brexitEurope: Signed the Lisbon Treaty without our say
issues.economy: Cutting taxes, creating jobs, fixing the economy
issues.governance: Cleaning up politics, fixing the economy, an elected House of Lords, a fair voting system, the power of recall, and stop unfair MP expenses.
